room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Revenge" by Escape Zone Ohio in Bellaire
room_description:
The pirates of Nanbooka were known for their wicked ways. They spent years sailing the high seas, terrorizing those they came into contact with, and, of course, stealing many treasures. They haven't been seen or heard from in years, and their treasure was never recovered.
You and your team are on vacation in the Caribbean. While strolling on the beach, you came across a mysterious pass leading to a secret opening in a pirate ship. You realize this is it! Break into the ship, find pirate treasure and escape pirate cove before Captain Burrow returns!
